Posts.EditableText:
Hi all

I'm plodding through creating a short text adventure. I have several rooms and I can move about. However the map, shown on the screen when I hit the Play button in the IDE, never shows anything other than my first room. 

Each room has some settings in the Map tab, with a name and colour, size (1 or 2). 

Anything I've missed?

Olly
Posts.HTML:
Hi all

I'm plodding through creating a short text adventure. I have several rooms and I can move about. However the map, shown on the screen when I hit the Play button in the IDE, never shows anything other than my first room.

Each room has some settings in the Map tab, with a name and colour, size (1 or 2).

Anything I've missed?

Olly

Posts.EditableText: Fixed it. I'd accidentally set the exit type to in/out rather than a direction.
Posts.HTML: Fixed it. I'd accidentally set the exit type to in/out rather than a direction.
